title: Everyone is Young Except for Me - Novel Updates
tags: Caring Protagonist   Cheats   Cooking   Elderly Protagonist   Gamers   Male Protagonist   MMORPG   Modern Day   Overpowered Protagonist   Protagonist Strong from the Start   Virtual Reality
author: Lee Hyeongdo   이현도
description:
An ordinary (?) grandfather, Choi Chuntaek. In an effort to protect his granddaughter, he started the virtual reality game ‘Arkstar.’

Then… he accidentally obtained a legendary class?>
